subject: p11052935
History: -year-old male with shortness of breath and fever.
Findings: The lungs are hyperexpanded and show hyperlucency of the upper lobes consistent with known emphysema. Asymmetric density is noted in the left lower lobe. The cardiomediastinal silhouette, hilar contours and pleural surfaces are normal. No pleural effusion or pneumothorax is present.
Impression: Moderate COPD. Probable left lower lobe pneumonia.
